page.title: 13FARM TIME TABLE
page.content: My name is Sara Weightman and I am 9. Mr. Robinson has a stock farm. He has sheep and cattle. He starts work at 6.30am. They have a cow called Mary. His farm is called Askerton Castle. They have calves and hens.Mr. Robinson comes in and has this breakfast at 7.30am.For breakfast he has bacon and 2 eggs,tea and toast. Normally that's over by 8.00 am. Then he goes back to his work.He looks at the sheep and cattle to see if they are all there and he sees if they are lame.Sheep sometimes fall over and it is called "cast".If they are like that for 4 hours they will die.He goes in for a cup of coffee at 9.45am.At 10.00 he cleans ditches and mends fences.Then 12.00 he has lunch. .The afternoon takes about the same pattern as the morning.This varies of course according to the time of year.
